mapper.update: update user set money=money+#{mon} where phone=#{phone}
update user set money=money+#{mon} where id=#{id}
update user set money=money-#{mon} where id= #{id}
mapper.select: select id, user_name, phone, password, avatar, gender, created_at, updated_at,money from user where phone=#{phone} and password=#{password}
select id, user_name, phone, password, avatar, gender, created_at, updated_at,money from user where user_name= #{userName}
mapper.insert: insert into user (user_name,phone) values (#{userName},#{phone}) on duplicate key update phone=values(phone)
